name: VIRUS (itch) (Anami)
description:
This game is in Spanish! (Not that it matters much...)

A group of friends and I made this during a game jam, it was fun :)

(I'm the one with the shark hat)

Keyboard:

  • Flechas = Move
  • Space = Shot

Controller:

  • Joysitck = Move
  • A = Shot

Team PalomoGames:

  • Anaís Tello
  • Graciela Ramirez 
  • Sofia Miranda

Thanks to:

  • Erick Stiff - for the music (if I could find where we downloaded it from, I would link it...)
